definition: to pass on/to spread/to transmit/to infect/to transfer/to circulate/to conduct (electricity)

sentences.english: This, in fact, was not reported in the Prophetic Sunnah, and there is no evidence on it.
sentences.chinese: 事實上，聖訓中沒有這樣的傳述，也沒有明顯的證據。

sentences.english: People believe me the more I am quoted.
sentences.chinese: 我被傳述得越多，人們就會更相信我。

sentences.english: And tell its raptures all abroad.
A great deal of frontier humour was oral.
sentences.chinese: 邊疆幽默有一大部分是由口頭傳述的。

sentences.english: Unless they are proper books written by sages, we should avoid reading them.
sentences.chinese: 若非聖賢所傳述的正經書，一定摒棄不看。

sentences.english: I wouldn't give tongue to such gossip.
